question: Which zone of the Indian Railways has installed ATMA (Automated Ticket Checking & Managing Access) machine?
explanation:
Indian Railways Central Railway zone has installed an automated ticket kiosk called ATMA â€“ Automated Ticket Checking & Managing Access machine.
The innovative machine has been introduced at the Nagpur railway station, under the New, Innovative Non-Fare Revenue Ideas Scheme (NINFRIS) policy to prevent transmission of COVID-19. The system has features for automated boarding protocol by ticket checking, human body temperature checking, and face mask checking.
